column4: can someone help me with how I would dual boot ubuntu with windows 7? I already have windows 7 (only) installed on this box. Link?

typically use the windows tools to defrage a couple of times and to shrink your windows partition leaving enough room for ubuntu.. then the ubuntu installer will recognize the unpartitioned space and use it.
so there won't be any problems? I've heard that sometimes windows won't recognize the new install and will just go straight to windows.
not typically. I've never had an issue in the last 4 years.
